text: DXCA (106.3 FM), broadcasting as 106.3 Bell FM, is a radio station owned and operated by Baganian Broadcasting Corporation. The station's studio is located at the 2nd Floor, BBC Bldg., Bana St., Brgy. Sta. Maria, Pagadian, and its transmitter is located in Mt. Pampalan, Pagadian.Pagadian City broadcaster killed for revenge, investigator saysLocal broadcast journalist killed in Zamboanga del Sur ambushThe Rise and Proliferation of Hybrid News and Music Radio Format, Why Some Are Successful and Others FailCriminal Case No. SB-13-CRM-0707 ==References== Category:Radio stations in Zamboanga del Sur Category:Radio stations established in 2000 Category:2000 establishments in the Philippines
title: DXCA
